seo.title: Telnyx - Global solutions for Communications, IOT, AI, Compute and Networking
seo.description: Your one-stop shop for infrastructure at the edge. The Telnyx Connectivity Cloud helps your business connect people, devices and applications everywhere.

hero.heading: Connectivity reimagined.
hero.copy: Explore our global solutions in compute, IoT, communications, and networking. What will you build with Telnyx?

products.heading: Manage every need from one platform
products.copy: Telnyx has helped thousands of companies create connectivity solutions that help them connect with customers, collaborate with colleagues, and manage networks of devices.

cards.heading: Communications
cards.copy: Connect with customers and team members via voice or messaging by leveraging our carrier status and millions of local numbers available for purchase in 180 countries.

cards.heading: IoT
cards.copy: Manage and configure IoT SIM cards over the air to securely connect IoT devices with flexible data coverage in 180+ countries.

cards.heading: Networking
cards.copy: Create secure cloud connections via our private global IP network and 15+ fully-owned PoPs in major metro areas—all designed for fast, reliable routing at the edge.

cards.heading: Compute
cards.copy: Harness the power of AI in your internal tools and customer-facing applications for an enhanced CX and increased operational efficiency.

useCases.heading: Get inspired
useCases.copy: Learn what you can create with Telnyx.

developerFocus.heading: Build what you need—in a way that works for you
developerFocus.copy: Use our extensive developer documentation and SDKs to build a connectivity suite that works exactly how you need it to.

items.heading: Use a platform built by developers, for developers
items.copy: Telnyx is committed to putting builders in the driver’s seat. Use a platform developers love to access global communications and connectivity infrastructure through a suite of intuitive APIs. Leverage our developer docs and SDKs to get up and running quickly.

code.heading: cURL
code.code:
``` json
curl -X POST \
  --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
  --header "Accept: application/json" \
  --header "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY" \
  --data '{"connection_id": "uuid", "to": "+18005550199", "from": "+18005550100"}' \
  https://api.telnyx.com/v2/calls
```

code.heading: Python
code.code:
``` python
import telnyx
telnyx.api_key = "YOUR_API_KEY"

telnyx.Call.create(connection_id="uuid", to="+18005550199", from_="+18005550100")
```

code.heading: Ruby
code.code:
``` ruby
require "telnyx"
Telnyx.api_key = "YOUR_API_KEY"

Telnyx::Call.create(connection_id: "uuid", to: "+18005550199", from: "+18005550100")
```

items.heading: Manage connectivity from one centralized hub
items.copy: Instead of navigating a web of service providers or aggregators to access global connectivity and infrastructure, Telnyx allows you to control your connectivity via APIs. Our self-service Mission Control Portal makes it easy for developers to own, manage, and scale connectivity, compute, and infrastructure.

media.alt: A graphic of a portal depicted in a vector format.

items.heading: Build secure, reliable global connections at the edge
items.copy: Telnyx’s global private multi-cloud IP network delivers consistent reliability and resilience for your applications. Our intuitive APIs empower you to build on top of scalable, enterprise-grade infrastructure.

media.alt: Map illustration showing various geographical features and locations.

items.heading: Leverage award-winning support and developer assistance
items.copy: Telnyx offers industry expertise and award-winning support so developers can focus on building and scaling your business without requiring deep investment in infrastructure, operations, or compliance. And our extensive documentation and SDKs are available for those who prefer a DIY approach.
